Text: wtf man 1000 seeds and no comment on A/V people that it just fucking laaaaaaaaaazy
I don't know about anyone else but it took me hours to download this torrent only to find nothing....fake!
A decent CAM, I would give it V:8 and A:6.  There is white noise all the way through, but with the volume turned up it's not terrible.  The video quality is very good indeed FOR A CAM.

Marcel - It's a cam, so most people in here tend to bear that in mind with their ratings and rate cam's as a cam and not in comparison to a blue ray rip ir a DVD rip.  Pretty sensible really mate.   Get off your high horse!


apeman73 - no it is not a fake.  Must be something up at your end.

for us who don't understand french, is there by any chance any subtitles out there? I'm dying to watch this movie.. watched like the first 5 minutes or so.. looks really good. love these kinda stories... but watching it and not understanding the french kinda sucks :P then i'd rather wait and go watch it at the cinema. still, good job though. good for a cam!
I wish this had english subs.  I have no idea what was being said in the French scenes.

First off - thanks to SAFCuk009 for the up!

I don't watch many CAM's, so I don't have much to compare this too, but the dialog is frequently difficult to hear, and the video sometimes looks like it was shot from an angle, rather than straight-on.

I found another version in the XBMC app "Navi-X" (http://website.navi-x.org/) that's 892MB and has much higher video quality - looks like a DVD rip to me, but I don't know what the source really was?

As an additional warning, about 15-20 minutes of this film (split up across about 4 scenes) is in French, with no subtitles.  It's enough to be annoying, but I still felt that I was able to follow the movie without knowing what was being said.
